website_summaries.verdict: A crunchy, spicy snack that leaves out the gluten, but not the taste.
pros: Variety of ingredients combine to make a good mix of textures
Includes noodles and crackers, peas and peanuts
Healthy and a good value for a gluten-free snack mix
cons: Includes several potential allergens such as peanuts and sesame, soy and possibly tree nuts

customer_reviews.title: Found rat dropping
customer_reviews.text: If I could 0 star this I would. I found an intact rat dropping about 1cm in length in my bag. I'd already eaten half of the product by that point. I felt queasy and disgusted for the better part of two days. What was once a favorite snack/brand of mine has now been ruined by what I can only assume to be poor factory hygiene and quality control. I know all food has a certain unpreventable and miniscule amount of insect segments and rat hairs in it, but something like this is unacceptable. I would like a refund please.
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Not enough crackers in the "cracker mix"
customer_reviews.text: I liked this mix, but there are a lot less crackers than I was expecting in a "cracker mix." I didn't want so many nuts or peas. Honestly I'd LOVE a just cracker bag. I used to get these kinds of crackers in Asian markets but those all have wheat in them and I can't eat gluten anymore. If the seller made a just cracker bag I'd eat them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: ColleenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Awful Product
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. Taste is bad. I searched but could only find *one* piece of dried fruit in the *entire* bag. The nut mix this brand sells is a much better product all around. Try it. But this gluten-free mix is truly awful.
customer_reviews.author: SDR

customer_reviews.title: Very yummy, but I wish they were a lot less salty.
customer_reviews.text: Very yummy, but I wish they were a lot less salty. There is a little bit of heat to them, that is perfect. I've had a couple that were not chewable, hard as a rock. The Nutritional Information on my package is different that what is pictured here, which is also different than the package I had originally bought in the local grocery store. They are very tasty though, again, I just wish they were less salty, on some of them that's all I can taste.
customer_reviews.author: Aussome

customer_reviews.title: Just The Right Amount of Spice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this snack. There are plenty of nuts and also other tasty tidbits like garbanzo beans and peas and a seasoning that is really tasty, spicy but not catch your mouth on fire spicy. I would recommend it to anyone looking for something that is not a chip.
customer_reviews.author: K. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Happy Mouth Food
customer_reviews.text: My husband tried this at work thanks to one of his co-workers. Being gluten-free due to celiac, we ordered a box of these. He took more than his share to work! Needless to say I had to order another six pack, this time I'm hiding one of the bags...LOL It's crunchy, lightly salty, mildly spicy and a great mix of cracker to nut ratio, plus the peas are a great addition. We love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Raggamuffin

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING. A savory snack that has great flavor, but without the excessive sodium
customer_reviews.text: I was incredibly impressed by this product. I've had dried peas before, but the texture of these are amazing...they are savory, and have flavor, but without the excessive sodium. I am very sensitive to a lot of sodium, and feel like most snacks these days are full of a ton of added ingredients. I will put these peas in small 2 oz sauce/to-go cups for a snack, or for my salad. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ehresman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love these peas! They are great for snacking on, even my 5 year old daughter loves them. I did have one bag that was a little more spicy than the rest (which I didn’t mind). They are typically a mild spice flavor not hot spicy though. I totally recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wisconsin.

customer_reviews.title: A delicious mix
customer_reviews.text: This mix is a great, well balanced blend of crunchy sticks, nuts, crackers, and more. Great variety, and wonderful flavor. Not at all overwhelming, not too strong at all but not too subtle either.
customer_reviews.author: skye astara

customer_reviews.title: YUM! A GREAT snack for my GF household!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has celiac...and it's tough to find a good "snack"! These are not cheap...but we LOVE the mix of ingredients...and the fact they are gluten free! Drop the price a buck a buck fifty...and these would be 5*'s NO doubt! Still...for the money I feel they are a "good" value!
customer_reviews.author: P. H. Johannsen

customer_reviews.title: Delicious crunchy high protein snack!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I mix it with organic peanuts for a new version of the Indian peas and peanuts snack. I share this treat with others and it is appreciated as a delicious high protein snack. Good for carrying in your bag for energy boost. Also good hiking snack.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: wish it was the real thing
customer_reviews.text: Loved my bhuja mix in Fiji -- this is in no way a substitute. Not sure why they can't make something similar. It is an okay snack and perhaps a hint of the spice and taste of the real thing... but disappointing. Please please can you do it right?
customer_reviews.author: Joe W

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This Indian snack is excellent, unlike the snacks in I normally found in my local Asian groceries. It tastes great and has a lot of “fancy” ingredients. Lots of almonds, green peas, and chickpeas. The crunchiness is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Penneney

customer_reviews.title: Delicious crunchy and healthy
customer_reviews.text: I’m not eating much meat these days and having more nuts in my life is a great compensation. I put this in everything - salads, rice, and noodle dishes. Great anxiety food for tv news watching too!
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after a friend recommended them. They're delicious. The whole family loves them, even the kids. A great, heathier, snack option...and (in case you're not a huge fan of peas) they don't even taste like peas!
customer_reviews.author: AutumnG

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I am normally not a fan of vegetable type snacks that are dried. These are seasoned to perfection and taste amazingly delicious. You can't eat just one handful.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren 4 him

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I freakin love these. I don't even like peas, but I love these! They're super flavorful. The bag has a good amount. Just a good snack!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Fave snack!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great snack one of my favorites! I love the mix of sweet and salty. I try very hard not to eat the whole bag in one sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I tried these at my son's house - he had bought them at the grocery store. I knew I wanted them for snacks so I bought the 6 pk of them, perfect price and a delicious and HEALTHY snack...SCORE!
customer_reviews.author: Lori D

customer_reviews.title: So Good!
customer_reviews.text: I am so addicted and love these crackers 😍 They are just perfect ;) One of the Best i have found and will continue to order. I would love more sultans but love the nice selection and the overall flavor combination, heat, & seasoning.
customer_reviews.author: scattycat419

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack
customer_reviews.text: We grabbed this snack a few weeks prior and never could find it again. Good old Aamazon has it. Great taste and addictive.
customer_reviews.author: Jon S,

customer_reviews.title: A treat from Down Under
customer_reviews.text: I discovered Bhuja mix while I was in Australia last year and I'm thrilled to be able to buy it here via Amazon. It's an Indian-style treat, and fairly (but not overwhelmingly) spicy.
customer_reviews.author: Saphira

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly tasty, healthy snack!
customer_reviews.text: I'll confess that I didn't want to try this product at first. I'm a very picky eater and this looked weird. One bite was all it took to convince me otherwise. As a person with celiac disease I'm always on the lookout for tasty, fairly inexpensive snacks that are healthy and this fits the bill on all of them. Excellent source of good fats and proteins and the carbs are not empty like so many other snack foods are. This 6-pack doesn't last two weeks in my family. I wish they sold a 12-pack.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Holiday Nut Mix
customer_reviews.text: Are you looking for a elegant and lightly spiced nut mix for a holiday gathering? Try a package of Bhuja Nut Mix. The first time I bought 1 package and I now buy 6 packages at a time. You will find a great selection crunchy snacks including cashews and almonds and a 'touch' of savory and salty spices.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Weaver

customer_reviews.title: I can't stop eating this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on a whim, eager to try something new. It's so good that I can't stop eating it. It's a new staple in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Crossbones Life

customer_reviews.title: Gluten free and yummy
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It’s gluten free which was the main reason I bought it but the noodles are crispy and so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty & healthy
customer_reviews.text: Tasty & healthy. They scratch my Indian food itch, and my 4 year olds love them.
customer_reviews.author: BGS

customer_reviews.title: Not a very large bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a very big bag for the price. You're better off buying a big bag from Costco
customer_reviews.author: Spuddicus

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Could use more crackers and less chickpea sticks and raisins/peanuts. Alot of people can't eat peanuts, I for one have a hard time digesting them. But still for flavor and uniqueness, these are really good.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice blend and spicy taste
customer_reviews.text: Perfect combination of nuts and spices when combined with craft beers
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: Great crunchy snack!
customer_reviews.text: To my surprise the Bhuja Nut Mix is a very tasty and satisfying snack. I absolutely enjoy eating everyday. Also knowing that you get your protein and no artificial colors or other flavors only crunchy and healthy snack for anyone in the family is awesome. Highly recommend this product! Can't wait to try other selectionside you have.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect spicy gluten-free snack!!
customer_reviews.text: Great healthy snack! Tasty with the perfect hint of spice and being gluten free was the perfect selling point for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Teenie Marinee

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: At first it was salty tasting but soon that turned to heavenly spicy. Love the taste!
customer_reviews.author: Garden Lady

customer_reviews.title: So good!! Easy protein snack!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these as a protein snack. The flavor is unique and yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: taste great
customer_reviews.text: these were a favorite but the price has increased & it is no longer a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Alice Mcateer

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. Just the right amount of spice/heat and a great crunchy texture.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this peas!
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere for these peas ever since my local Costco store stopped selling them. They are absolutely irresistable. I decided to buy them off Amazon since I can get 6 bags for $20. Great deal, and they came relatively fast. Only downside is I expected the bags to be as big as the Costco bags but I guess that's my fault since I didn't really observe the bag sizes. Will definitely buy again if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: jcha88

customer_reviews.title: Bhuja Original Mix
customer_reviews.text: For people who like a bit of spiciness in their snacks, Bhuja makes a great example of taste, spice and ingredients and because it's vacuum packed, the contents are crispy and delicious with spices to make the tongue tingle. The mix is highly recommended. The first taste of this snack, a couple of years ago, had me hooked and I've bought them regularly since. The flavor is addictive. And because of the great taste, they tempt one to become creative in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Waldman

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Snack
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic snack, full of protein. The flavor is delicious too! I bought the multipack last time and really love the crunchy peas and this nut mix. The seasoning is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Addicting
customer_reviews.text: Addicting, slightly spicy, crunchy goodness. Slightly more expensive than I've found in stores, but worth skipping the hassle to get 6 bags at once, shipped to your door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spicy and crunchy
customer_reviews.text: I love these. My sister does too. Whenever she’s over she cleans me out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!! No really.
customer_reviews.text: If you love to snack on peanuts, almonds, etc. you need to try these. I first found these in my local supermarket. The day I ripped these open and tasted, I hopped onto Amazon and bought a box. They are that good. Great spicy seasoning, generous variety of nuts and some dried peas and corn chips. Definitely one of my staple snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Cheeseborough

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it contains soy but it's delicious but I can't eat it because of the soy😒
customer_reviews.author: Blackwidow

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Not Salty. Flavorful. Non-GMO project Verified. Satisfies snack cravings well. I have tried all of the BHUJA mixes and they are all great. Support companies who are going above and beyond to produce safe, great tasting and quality foods... I will be buying more of this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: RDSWY4

customer_reviews.title: Tasty low fat snack but a little bit too spicy
customer_reviews.text: Tasty low fat snack but a little bit too spicy
customer_reviews.author: Rachel  Ganz

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great snack, all of the flavors and textures go great together. They have a little spice to them, but not over powering. My children even love them!
customer_reviews.author: Violet Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: If you like Indian food you may like this snack mix. To me it is like heaven. I ate a whole bag in a couple of hours :/ (not like heaven). A tiny tiny bit spicy to some people (I live in the South and know what real spicy is). To me it could actually be a bit more spicy. Anyways, some peanuts, wheat crackers, dry peas and sultanas (light seedless raisins)
customer_reviews.author: B. Hood

customer_reviews.title: Little to expensive for me
customer_reviews.text: This is expensive for the little bit you get. But it was good.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Just peas
customer_reviews.text: Like the nut mix better. It's just peas they need something else with it.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I was not a big fan of the yellow stick things (weird spicy flavor) and those were the most abundant item in my mix. The raisins were also disgusting. I wish this mix had more crackers, peas, and chickpeas. Would not personally buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Mebrea

customer_reviews.title: YUM!
customer_reviews.text: Even better than expected! Bought these for the hubby for Christmas and I've eaten half the bag myself. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Satisfies my chip cravings
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious. I don't hate peas but I'm typically not a fan of them. These are so good though! Satisfies my chip cravings. Not too hot and has great flavor
customer_reviews.author: Dulce L.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Nit sure why but the ones from my store taste fresher
customer_reviews.author: Dean Mueck

customer_reviews.title: Recipe appears to have changed
customer_reviews.text: The Original mix snack used to be great, but the latest delivery (May 2020) is way too salty to be enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Denim

customer_reviews.title: This is an AMAZING snack!
customer_reviews.text: This is an AMAZING snack!!! Love love love the taste, texture, everything! Great deal and can’t find them anywhere in stores.
customer_reviews.author: IwishIwereaMermaid

customer_reviews.title: Healthy addiction!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously could not believe how much flavor could fit in one pea! My friends love this snack as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for satisfying that salty crunch craving
customer_reviews.text: I found these in a health food store and then ordered in bulk on Amazon. They taste great. They are super crunchy, a little salty and great for curbing afternoon or late night hunger. Everyone likes them from kids to grown ups. I give them as gifts and people thank me.
customer_reviews.author: PLB

customer_reviews.title: Bring Back Old Recipe
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this snack numerous times it used to taste great. The flavor of seasoning has changed it’s not palatable any more. Also the packaging picture has changed from old one too.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Healthy alternative
customer_reviews.text: Omg 😮 love these! They taste like spicy corn chips! Soooo good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spicy good snack
customer_reviews.text: While they are not quite as good (spicy) as they used to be...they are still a yummy snack! I love them but can't find in the stores anymore. So glad to have fou d online.
customer_reviews.author: heather vagasky

customer_reviews.title: Not value for money
customer_reviews.text: It’s too costly for quantity we get. Also it was only full of peanuts
customer_reviews.author: Bhushan

customer_reviews.title: Peas galore. Snackers rejoice.
customer_reviews.text: Yall have got to try these peas. They were so good i immediately called my mom to tell her about them. We bought eachother 2 boxes for christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Shields

customer_reviews.title: Good spicy taste! Not enough cashews!
customer_reviews.text: A little spicy, but this order was for an adult, but my (5) year old enjoyed the taste, followed with deer Park water.
customer_reviews.author: Omega Centuti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome snack mix!
customer_reviews.text: Found this mix when touring Australia and fell in love with it! So glad to find them on Amazon! Love, love the spicy kick to this snack mix!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Lanahan

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't believe this was so awful. Few nuts, mostly crackers the had no taste. Incredibly expensive for a few nuts and some inferior cracker pieces. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: S. Whitehouse

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Bold and spicy but not too spicy (I am a wimp). Flavor is amazing-these are very addictive and an excellent alternative to chips when craving something crunchy and salty. Loved them so much that I added them to my subscribe and save!
customer_reviews.author: T. JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: These are very good. And price runs about same in store.
customer_reviews.author: Angel McDorman

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Love the flavor and a fun way to eat your vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Klynn

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Best snack mix ever....just enough spice! Always have a bag in my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Sue T

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Love these peas! They are crunchy, spicy, salty. Great on salads and we eat them all the time as snacks.Some Safeways carry them, but we started ordering them on line a while ago and get steady shipments. Everyone I serve them to as a salad topper comments on them and likes them.
customer_reviews.author: ya

customer_reviews.title: One of the best snack mixes - for Gluten Free or Not!
customer_reviews.text: I am gluten free (Celia),and the Bhuja Snack Mix is the only one of its kind. During my last hiking trip to the Rockies, I shared this snack mix with my husband and son who don't have to be GF and they loved the flavor and the variety of items in the mix. I ordered a case and I'll soon be ordering another case. Thank you Bhuja!
customer_reviews.author: Cynwoman

customer_reviews.title: I bought it as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my niece, great product. Not oily at all and taste fresh and delicious. Better alternative snack than all the sweets out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All things good to snack on
customer_reviews.text: Taste is a personal choice but for me, I have bought the nut mix and would recommend it if you like a lot of nuts and crunchy nibbles. Usually you receive more nibbles and less nuts in other brands but not in this case. I love every bite:)
customer_reviews.author: Berna G.

customer_reviews.title: SO good!
customer_reviews.text: This mix is so good, it's dangerous! Good luck being able to stop eating it and putting the package down. There is enough of a "kick" to make your mouth enjoy it. I am not a fan of spicy things (I guess I'm a wimp) but this is not too hot for me. The combination of ingredients is so yummy!!! I bought it at a local store in a bigger bag. I wish Amazon sold it in bigger bags...I notice that the mix of ingredients varies from small bag to small bag (some have much more of the multigrain noodles than other bags). Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Ok Product
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product but it’s more a nut mix with limited flavoring . Priced above comparable imports .
customer_reviews.author: Vijay J.

customer_reviews.title: BHUJA cracker mix
customer_reviews.text: These never disappoint! They are such a nice mixture of flavors. I find that being gluten free, it is difficult to find snacks that are crunchy, different AND FRESH! This meets all of the criteria! They are delicious.....I find it hard to not eat a whole bag at one time!!! I highly recommend these for a tasty exotic crunchy snack!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy!
customer_reviews.text: These are SO yummy, and they are a healthy snack. Not high in sodium, and not too high in carbohydrates either.
customer_reviews.author: Saelon R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these crunchy peas. They're great on their own as a snack, added to salads and casserole dishes
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: crunchy and light high protein snack
customer_reviews.text: We are vegetarian/vegans and in need of protein. This is a great on the-go lightweight high protein snack. The spices are just right to give it an interesting flavor without being overwhelming. Safeway used to carry this but doesn't anymore so I'm glad Amazon has them. I use it in gorp and also just to have in the car, etc, as a crunchy alternative to high calorie potato chips.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Best snack ever
customer_reviews.text: We love this, always have abowl out and it disappears quickly. Perfect mix of spice.
customer_reviews.author: Buttonheadqueen

customer_reviews.title: great snack
customer_reviews.text: a friend introduced me to these snacks. but i cant find them in any stores in my town, so ordered here. yummy snacks
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These have a great flavor, are full of protein and are a good replacement for the normal Chinese noodles that have little nutritive value. They are good as a snack as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brock

customer_reviews.title: I love this snack mix
customer_reviews.text: I love this snack mix! It's a great combo of salty and spicy. The mix is nice and even, perfect amount of each ingredient!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Snack
customer_reviews.text: The Bhuja Seasoned Peas are an Excellent Non-Potato Chip Snack. Low Calorie, Low Fat and Low Sodium.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hurd

customer_reviews.title: it's ok not WOW
customer_reviews.text: it's alright, not special! I would not buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Ibtehal

customer_reviews.title: So good even picky kids eat it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mix! Even my picky kids love this mix!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Gaston

customer_reviews.title: BEYOND AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I saw other reviews about people raving and just had to give these a try...we will not be without them! They are amazing and are addicting. They make a healthy snack on their own and are really great atop of salads for a healthier crunchy alternative. The flavor is the perfect amount of spice!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Barseghian

customer_reviews.title: YUM yum yum.
customer_reviews.text: The taste is great. And they are crunchy and addictive. Only bad thing I get major farts from these things and I would say they are not healthy. Addictive like salty chips I can't stop. It's 9am. Why am I eating these peas?!?! Cause I can't stop.
customer_reviews.author: Rena Hall

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is addictive!! The spicy seasoning mixed with the rice crackers and other items is perfect! Once I open a bag, I usually don't stop snacking until it's gone.
customer_reviews.author: Yo DebBra

customer_reviews.title: Friggin Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure one can buy the peas and spices then dry them out but the way the company makes theirs is outstanding. I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so good! It’s spicy and crunchy and perfect for a snack. I wish there were more in the bag but I will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Mattingly

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderfully addicting and tasty snack!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff! This is truly one of the best tasting snacks available. Had first tried it when COSTO was selling the original Bhuja mix and have been hooked on it ever since. When we get finished with this batch, the next purchase will be the fruit and nut mix.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Bendersky

customer_reviews.title: YUMMM!
customer_reviews.text: YUMMMM! These are awesome. Good size bag. Thank you. The best crunchy seasoned Peas I've ever had!
customer_reviews.author: L. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: This trail mix is delicious. It's a great savory vegan snack, and a nice little source of protein. I love the flavour.
customer_reviews.author: April Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fell in love with these in Australia- I had to find it ...
customer_reviews.text: Fell in love with these in Australia- I had to find it when I got home- happy to have them but I do feel like they are lacking the same intense flavor... Not sure if I will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: doot

customer_reviews.title: Best GF Snack EVER
customer_reviews.text: Perfect GF snack. I munch on this all the time at work and it keeps me full and satisfies my salt craving while still being pretty healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: These are a great snack if you are trying to give up chips
customer_reviews.text: These are a great snack if you are trying to give up chips. These will give you that crunch that you need.
customer_reviews.author: Gernell L Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great but incorrect number shipped
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and love it but only received a count of 5. That means I paid around 16% more for this product that I needed to. There are supposed to be 6 in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Adams

customer_reviews.title: So delicious
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite snacks and I can't hardly find them anywhere! The price is kind of high...but to me it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: lissybear

customer_reviews.title: Watch Out
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in these. They were very spicy and they gave me bathroom troubles. Will not buy again!
